mapper.sql: select li.info_id, li.enterprise_name, li.user_id, li.ipaddr, li.status, li.msg, li.access_time, u.user_name as user_name, u.nick_name as user_nick from sys_logininfor li left join sys_user u on u.user_id = li.user_id left join sys_post p on p.post_id = u.post_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = u.dept_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfor (enterprise_name, user_name, user_id, status, ipaddr, msg, tenant_id) values (#{enterpriseName}, #{userName}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{ipaddr}, #{msg}, #{enterpriseId})
mapper.select:
where 1 = 1
AND li.ipaddr like concat('%', #{ipaddr}, '%')
AND li.status = #{status}
AND u.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.nick_name like concat('%', #{userNick}, '%')
and date_format(li.access_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(li.access_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
${params.dataScope} order by li.info_id desc
